page.title: 06One Of The Local Shops.
page.content: {The Spar By Claire Evans. The Spar is quite a big supermarket.It is owned by Paul and Ray.They have two children called Manjet and Sukhi.The shop has been re named "The Six Bells General Store and Office Licence". The counter is on the right as you enter the shop.Behind this sweet and till counter is the cigarette counter. To the left is the fruit and vegetable counter.Next to this are tinned and packet foods.At the far end there is the freezer.Other counters include the bread and cake counter,toiletries,baby foods and fresh produce.
